title: Time After Time
description: Leah French thought she knew Paul Gregory. They had worked together for years, and he had never been anything but coolly professional. Then the nightly dreams began, each matching her with Paul in an alarmingly sensuous way. The man she met in her dreams couldn't possibly be the man she saw at the office--or could he? An assessing gaze, a slip of the tongue and veiled hints pointed to the disturbing possibility that the real Paul and the Paul of her reveries shared one crucial similarity: both wanted Leah!
author: Billie Green
